document.docAuthor: Silva, Guilherme Liberato Da, Metzelthin, Maicon Henrique, Silva, Onilda Santos Da & Ferla, Noeli Juarez
document.masterDocTitle: Catalogue of the mite family Tydeidae (Acari: Prostigmata) with the world key to the species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalogue of the mite family Tydeidae (Acari: Prostigmata) with the world key to the species

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Pseudolorryia
Kaźmierski, 1989 b
: 292
; Kaźmierski, 1998 : 338 ;
Type species
:
Pseudolorryia edwardbakeri
Kaźmierski, 1989 b
: 298
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
263 .
Pseudolorryia andreae (
Ueckermann & Smith-Meyer, 1979 b
)
: 117 , South Africa , from
Combretum molle R.Br. ex G.Don.
and
Dombeya rotundifolia (Hochst.)
.

Other names:
Paralorryia andreae—
original,
Pseudolorryia andreae—
Kaźmierski ( 1989 b
, 1998 ).
Type depository:
National Collection of Acari, Plant Protection Research Institute, Pretoria, South Africa .

264 .
Pseudolorryia edwardbakeri
Kaźmierski, 1989 b
: 298
, Poland , from bark of
Abies alba Mill. Other
names:
Pseudolorryia edwardbakeri—
Kaźmierski ( 1998 ),
Donczyk ( 2006 )
.
Type depository:
Zoological Museum in Hamburg, Germany .

265 .
Pseudolorryia fustis (Ueckermann, in Smith-Meyer & Ueckermann, 1988 )
: 19 , South Africa , from
Athrixia heterophylla (Thunb.)
and
Diospyros austro-africana
De Wint.

Other names:
Tydeus fustis—
original,
Pseudolorryia fustis—
Kaźmierski ( 1998 ).

Type depository:
National Collection of Acari, Plant Protection Research Institute, Pretoria, South Africa .

266 .
Pseudolorryia mumai ( Baker , 1970 )
: 168 , United States of America , from grapevine leaves. Other names:
Tydeus mumai—
original,
Pseudolorryia mumai—
Kaźmierski ( 1998 ).

Type depository:
National Museum of Natural History ( NMNH ), Washington, D.C., USA .

267 .
Pseudolorryia nicaraguensis ( Baker , 1970 )
: 166 , Nicaragua , from cocoa leaves.

Other names:
Tydeus nicaraguensis—
original,
Pseudolorryia nicaraguensis—
Kaźmierski ( 1998 ).
Type depository:
National Museum of Natural History ( NMNH ), Washington, D.C., USA .

268 .
Pseudolorryia nikitensis (Livshitz in
Kuznetzov & Livshitz, 1973 c
)
: 604 , Crimea, from tree shrub. Other names:
Paralorryia nikitensis—
original,
Pseudolorryia nikitensis
Kaźmierski ( 1989 b
, 1998 ).
Type depository:
Department of Entomology and Phytopathology of the State Nikitsky Botanical Garden, Yalta, Crimea.

269 .
Pseudolorryia pseudofustis (Theron & Ueckermann in
Theron et al. 2012
)
: 264 , South Africa , from
Protea punctata Meisn.
(Water sugarbush).

Type depository:
National Collection of Arachnida, ARC-Plant Protection Research Institute, Pretoria, South Africa .

270 .
Pseudolorryia spinea (Livshitz, in Livshitz & Kuznetzov, 1973 b)
: 52 , Crimea, from
Aesculus hippocastanum
L. (horse-chestnut).

Other names:
Tydeus spineus—
original,
Pseudolorryia spinea—
Kaźmierski ( 1989 b
, 1998 ).
Type depository:
Department of Entomology and Phytopathology of the State Nikitsky Botanical Garden, Yalta, Crimea.

271 .
Pseudolorryia starri (
Baker , 1944 b
)
: 73 , Mexico , from mosses.

Other names:
Tydeus starri—
original,
Pseudolorryia starri—
Kaźmierski ( 1998 ),
Sadeghi et al. ( 2012 )
.
Type depository:
United States National Museum of Natural History ( USNM ) at Beltsville, Maryland, USA .

272 .
Pseudolorryia striata (
Momen & Lundqvist, 1996 c
)
: 290 , Sweden , from moss on soil surface, bark of apple tree and the bark on the trunk of a
Salix fragilis L.

Other names:
Pseudolorryia striatus—
original,
Pseudolorryia striata—
Kaźmierski ( 1998 ),
Tempfli et al. ( 2015 )
.

Type depository:
Zoological Museum, Lund University, Sweden .

273 .
Pseudolorryia taurica (
Kuznetzov, 1971
)
: 1741 , Crimea, from
Hovenia dulcis Thunb. Other
names:
Lorryia taurica—
original,
Pseudolorryia taurica—
Kaźmierski ( 1989 b
, 1998 ).
Type depository:
Department of Entomology and Phytopathology of the State Nikitsky Botanical Garden, Yalta, Crimea.

274 .
Pseudolorryia turrialbensis ( Baker , 1970 )
: 175 , Costa Rica , from coffee leaves.

Other names:
Tydeus turrialbensis—
original,
Pseudolorryia turrialbensis
–Kaźmierski ( 1998 ).
Type depository:
National Museum of Natural History ( NMNH ), Washington, D.C., USA .
